MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Queensferry Road and surrounding streets. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.30AM in order for our engineers to install generators while they work on an underground cable fault. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 12.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 10.45AM on 09 January 2021.
